channel.title: [Project Insanity] SoulPlanet
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0mdmskV.png[/img]
Sorry for this [img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9e/U%2B2191.svg/12px-U%2B2191.svg.png[/img] bad Picture, im not good at photoshop
Hey mopar! Im currently working on a PI like some weeks.
Developer Log:
[b]--12.4.13--[/b] Fixed Lagg when moving around [b]--13.3.13--[/b] Added Donator Feature 'Add Special' at Quest Tab Added Donator Feature 'Reset Special' at Quest Tab Added Staff command 'hide' at Quest Tab Added Staff command 'unhide' at Quest Tab Added Colors to some Commands/Messages [b]--14.3.13--[/b] Changed Economy to Spawn server Added 'Meleeset' To Quest Tab Rofl, all range weapons are glitched. [b]--15.3.13--[/b] Fixed Range Weapons Added a Spawn Section to the Quest Tab ( Melee Set, Mage Set etc.) Currently only melee set and Mage set spawns [b]--16.3.13--[/b] Added that players cant xlog anymore Added Statius,Vesta etc. to PKP Shop Added 'Sights' as a teleport in the Spellbook 'Visit Jail' Sight added 'Jungle Strykeworm' Sight added Fixed City Teleports Added that you need Coins + Tokkuls to spawn items at the Quest Tab Added 'tokkuls' Added that you get 10 Pk Points, 1000 Tokkuls + 1M GP for killing a player [b]--17.3.13--[/b] Now you can spawn up to 80 % of the items Statius,Vesta's,Zuriels now costs PKP [b]Removed ::item spawning[/b] Added in 'Mage set' the gear. Added 'Rush Set' in Quest tab [b]HANDCANNON ADDED[/b] (No Spec) Added Korasi to PKP shop Added Handcannon to PKP Shop Added handcannon shots to PKP Shop Made that handcannon is shooting 2 Hits so we dont need to add a special ;) [b]--18.3.13--[/b] Added 'Staff commands' Section at quest tab Added into the 'Staff commands' section 'Helpzone' + 'Yell {Helpzone} ' Fixed that ' You ran out of shots ' when you attack a npc/player with handcannon [b]--19.4.13--[/b] Added 7 Suggestion open buttons at quest tab (FOR SPAWNING) Added Request help for player Added confirm help for staff members [b]Added KQ[/b] Fixed Prices ;) //thanks to eclipse rsps Added City Teleport to Lunar Spellbook Added Staff commands section at Quest Tab Perfected every Special attack Added Dungeoonering Cape! With Model O.O [i][b]Fixed Primal Weapons[/b][/i] [i][b]Closed KQ [NULLPOINTER] >.<[/b][/i] [i][b]Added Jungle strykeworm, still animations are missing[/b][/i] [b]--24.4.13--[/b] [b]Added All Strykeworms + their animations and effects[/b]
[b]Let me describe you the Spawning system : As starter you get 5 M gp + 500 Tokens
Each set costs 100 - 2000 Tokens + 100 k - 3 m depends on which Gear this is. Like when you spawn Melee Set (rune) it would just cost 350 k and 100 tokens But when you spawn (example) Vesta's set it would cost 3 - 6 m and about 1000 - 2000 tokens
How am i able to earn that money + tokens? Kill players. Simple answer. For every kill you get 1M Gp + 1000 tokens. Pic : [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/05ODWeh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/1678scm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/oar6zq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/34gsj9i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2youx77.png[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/6qiqn7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/5xjqlg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bix0GRz.png[/img] EP SYSTEM!
Yeah yeah, i move the Hide / Unhide later -.-'
Please dont flame, this is my first project ever so yeah :)

item.title: [Project Insanity] SoulPlanet
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Thanks :D[quote=“Soulcist, post:3, topic:517763”]Good luck with the development, showing a picture of someone running and the quest tab isn’t going to show us much on how good this server is coming along.[/quote]
It’s the pk timer ^^ I will fix some pictures so it will look better + Thanks :3[quote=“nolan2131, post:4, topic:517763”]Do you plan on doing anything with combat since you changed over to spawn? Also good luck.[/quote]
Of Course i do The Combat system i currently have is currently not the best. Im trying to re-add everything, Like taking it an age higher.
I will totally do my best

  • Thank you all for replying me :3 Fixing Pictures now

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Insanity] SoulPlanet
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Sorry for this bad Picture, im not good at photoshop

Hey mopar!
Im currently working on a PI like some weeks.

Developer Log:

–12.4.13–
Fixed Lagg when moving around
–13.3.13–
Added Donator Feature ‘Add Special’ at Quest Tab
Added Donator Feature ‘Reset Special’ at Quest Tab
Added Staff command ‘hide’ at Quest Tab
Added Staff command ‘unhide’ at Quest Tab
Added Colors to some Commands/Messages
–14.3.13–
Changed Economy to Spawn server
Added ‘Meleeset’ To Quest Tab
Rofl, all range weapons are glitched.
–15.3.13–
Fixed Range Weapons
Added a Spawn Section to the Quest Tab ( Melee Set, Mage Set etc.) Currently only melee set and Mage set spawns
–16.3.13–
Added that players cant xlog anymore
Added Statius,Vesta etc. to PKP Shop
Added ‘Sights’ as a teleport in the Spellbook
‘Visit Jail’ Sight added
‘Jungle Strykeworm’ Sight added
Fixed City Teleports
Added that you need Coins + Tokkuls to spawn items at the Quest Tab
Added ‘tokkuls’
Added that you get 10 Pk Points, 1000 Tokkuls + 1M GP for killing a player
–17.3.13–
Now you can spawn up to 80 % of the items
Statius,Vesta’s,Zuriels now costs PKP
Removed ::item spawning
Added in ‘Mage set’ the gear.
Added ‘Rush Set’ in Quest tab
HANDCANNON ADDED (No Spec)
Added Korasi to PKP shop
Added Handcannon to PKP Shop
Added handcannon shots to PKP Shop
Made that handcannon is shooting 2 Hits so we dont need to add a special
–18.3.13–
Added ‘Staff commands’ Section at quest tab
Added into the ‘Staff commands’ section ‘Helpzone’ + 'Yell {Helpzone} ’
Fixed that ’ You ran out of shots ’ when you attack a npc/player with handcannon
–19.4.13–
Added 7 Suggestion open buttons at quest tab (FOR SPAWNING)
Added Request help for player
Added confirm help for staff members
Added KQ
Fixed Prices //thanks to eclipse rsps
Added City Teleport to Lunar Spellbook
Added Staff commands section at Quest Tab
Perfected every Special attack
Added Dungeoonering Cape! With Model O.O
Fixed Primal Weapons
Closed KQ [NULLPOINTER] >.<
Added Jungle strykeworm, still animations are missing
–24.4.13–
Added All Strykeworms + their animations and effects

[b]Let me describe you the Spawning system :
As starter you get 5 M gp + 500 Tokens

Each set costs 100 - 2000 Tokens + 100 k - 3 m depends on which Gear this is.
Like when you spawn Melee Set (rune) it would just cost 350 k and 100 tokens
But when you spawn (example) Vesta’s set it would cost 3 - 6 m and about 1000 - 2000 tokens

How am i able to earn that money + tokens?
Kill players. Simple answer.
For every kill you get 1M Gp + 1000 tokens.
Pic :



34gsj9i.png518×501




EP SYSTEM!

Yeah yeah, i move the Hide / Unhide later -.-’

Please dont flame, this is my first project ever so yeah

Read full topic
